CustomField.formula:
IF( (LimitsFutureCallsUsed__c / LimitsFutureCallsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsFutureCallsUsed__c / LimitsFutureCallsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsFutureCallsUsed__c / LimitsFutureCallsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsFutureCallsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsFutureCallsMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsFutureCallsUsed__c / LimitsFutureCallsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: Future Calls
